lead_paragraph: The Murray crayfish, the world’s second largest, is sensitive to changes in habitat. But populations can come back from current declines.

headline.print_headline: Enormous crayfish sensitive to habitat damage
headline.main: A Big Australian Crayfish, Pretty and in Trouble
